Why you should choose FLANO

FLANO is a Cardano Native DeFi Cryptocurrency which will offer multiple opportunities for owners to earn a passive income by combining the most rewarding DeFi features. Staking: Up to 300% APY. Farming: Stake your Liquidity Points to earn a share of the reward pool.
